name: Grab Em' All!
description:
"Grab Em' All" is a claw-machine simulator where you get to play as a claw and collect stuffed animals. The bigger the stuffed animal, the harder it is to get. But the rewards are so much better!

Play by yourself, or play with a (nearby) friend. Race against the clock to collect as many of the stuffed animals as you can. The bigger and more difficult the animals are, the more points and time you'll get. 

=======================

This game was created in under a week as a project for a class! It is a (heavily) modified version of Rocket Patrol - the APF-M1000 built-in gallery shooter, built using Phaser 3.
Feedback would very much be appreciated!

=======================

Background Music: "Powerup!" by Jeremy Blake
